p: Territory of Washington In Justice Court before County of Walla Walla O.P. Lacy? Judge of the Peace Territory of Washington Charged with being vs an habitual drunkard Adaline Oneil Deft and disorderly person

Defendant arranged and pleads guilty to said charge wherefor the court did adjudge the Deft a and the court did order the Deft to give bonds in the sum of one hundred dollars for her good behavior for the term of three months and in default she was commanded to the of Walla Walla County for three months.
